stories.fantasy_headline: Ancient Wizards Discover Life's Threads Older Than All Realms
stories.fantasy_story: The Elder Alchemists of the Grand College have unearthed profound knowledge! They found ancient life-threads, tiny magical patterns, that existed even before the first creatures walked the lands. These patterns, like primordial runes, are woven into every living thing today. By studying them, wizards hope to understand the very first sparks of life and how magic began to shape the world.

stories.fantasy_headline: Sages Reveal Great Drought Reshaped Isle of Silent Sentinels
stories.fantasy_story: Chroniclers from the Crystal Tower have uncovered a forgotten truth about the Far Eastern Isles. Around five centuries ago, a terrible drought, lasting over a hundred years, gripped the land, making water exceedingly scarce. This long dry spell dramatically altered how the islanders lived, worshipped their ancient spirits, and organized their clans, proving their resilience amidst hardship.

stories.fantasy_headline: Master Golemwright Retires from Animated Automata Clan
stories.fantasy_story: Robert Playter, the venerable Master Golemwright of the Clan of Animated Automatons, has announced his retirement from leadership. For six years, he guided the guild through challenging times, even overseeing its joining with the powerful Eastern Houses. His successor will now take up the mantle of crafting wondrous clockwork servants.
